DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study collect data technical aspect Lasparoscopy-assisted ERCP patient outcome help guide future medical care patient Roux-en-Y gastric bypass surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopy-assisted ERCP Patients With Altered Gastric Anatome
DOC.detailed_description: Patients would Roux-en-Y gastric bypass past alter gastric anatomy . Now developed bilary and/or pancreatic problem require ERCP . With altered gastric anatomy standard ERCP would possible . Thus schedule Laparoscopy-assisted ERCP .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Altered gastric anatomy Scheduled undergo laparoscopyassisted ERCP Any contraindication perform endoscopy Participation another research protocol could interfere influence outcome measure present study . The subject unable/unwilling give inform consent
